longBusinessSummary: Sodick Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of numerical control electric discharge machines (EDMs). The company operates through Machine Tool, Industrial Machinery, Food Machinery, and Other segments. It's Machine Tool segment offers die-sinker, wire-cut, and small-hole drilling EDMs; metal 3D printers; precision machining centers; CAD-CAM solutions; and electron beam products applied in mold manufacturing and component machining. The company's Industrial Machinery segment provides horizontal injection molding machines, vertical injection molding machines, light metal alloy injection molding machines, and injection molding production automation systems, as well as quality and production management software used for manufacturing of plastic components and other difficult-to-machine materials, special materials, light metal components, etc. It's Food Machinery segment offers noodle-making machines, automatic noodle boiling/steaming/sterilizing systems, and aseptically-packed cooked rice production systems for the production of noodles, confectionery, precooked side dishes, and boxed meals sold at convenience stores and supermarkets. The company's Other segment provides ceramics, linear motors, and LED lighting products applied in design and manufacturing of mold, production of plastic molded parts, and manufacturing of linear motors products. It servs its customers including automobiles, IT, smartphones, electrical and electronic parts, aerospace, medical equipment, food manufacturers, restaurant chains, frozen food manufacturers, etc. Sodick Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.
